#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
	#define gc getchar
#else
	#define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif // ONLINE_JUDGE

char _str[30];

#define WRITE_INT(_x)				\
  {						\
    register int _i = 0;			\
    long long _tmp = (_x);			\
    do						\
      {						\
	*(_str + _i++) = _tmp % 10 + 48;	\
	_tmp /= 10;				\
      } while (_tmp != 0);			\
    for (_i--; _i >= 0; _i--)			\
      putchar_unlocked(*(_str + _i));		\
  }
using namespace std;
inline long long read(){
	long long num=0;
	char c=gc();
	while(!(c>='0' && c<='9')){
		c = gc();
	}
	while(c>='0' && c<='9'){
		num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+c-'0';
		c=gc();
 	}
	return (num);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    t=read();
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n;
        n=read();
        int a[105]={0};
        int x,i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
                a[x]++;
        }
        int cost=0;
        for(i=0;i<105;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==1)
            {
                cost+=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        cout<<cost<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
